SEARCH
Package Application.Controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
Application.Controllers.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the Main form in the application. Contains controls to navigate to different forms. Populates tables with items reflected in the Inventory class and allows users to query results based off of provided filters. Provides the capability to delete items from the Inventory through the tables. Allows the user to exit the application through the Exit button.

    • modifyProductForm

      public void modifyProductForm(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws IOException
      Takes the user to the Modify Part form. Communicates the the part form to load a part into the TextFields before the scene is even set. Prompts the user when no part is selected.
      Parameters:
      e - The event object.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct()
      Method to delete products. Tied to the Delete Product button. Waits for confirmation to ensure products are correctly deleted. Denies deletion of any part that has parts associated with it. Prompts the user if no product is selected.

    • modifyPartForm

      public void modifyPartForm(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws IOException
      Takes the user to the Modify Product form. Communicates the the product form to load a product into the TextFields before the scene is even set. Prompts the user when no product is selected.
      Parameters:

    • deletePart

      public void deletePart()
      Method to delete parts. Tied to the Delete Part button. Waits for confirmation to ensure parts are correctly deleted. Prompts the user if no part is selected.

    • exitProgram

      public void exitProgram()
      Method to exit the program. Attached to the Exit button. Prompts the user if either parts or products is not empty.
